description: Pick your Hibs XI for Europa clash
title: Pick your Hibs XI for Europa clash
title_page: Pick your Hibs XI for Europa clash - BBC Sport
maintext:
Hibs get their European adventure - and the new season - under way tonight when they face Inter d'Escaldes in the first leg of the Europa Conference League second qualifying round.
If you were Lee Johnson, who would you pick to get the job done? Choose your Hibs XI here.
